title: Research State of Disposable Non-plastic Straws - SciOpen
body: The continuous production of disposable plastic straw places a high demand on global petrochemical resources and a significant environmental burden. Biodegradable and eco-friendly straws have therefore been studied and produced worldwide. The aim is to provide a reference for the development and research of more sustainable straw options.
